item.title: 中国限制战略矿产出口
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对中国商品征收 10%的额外关税生效几分钟后，中国于周二宣布了针对国防、清洁能源和其他行业使用的五种金属的全面出口管制措施。【原文：China announced sweeping export controls on Tuesday targeting five metals used across defence, clean energy and other industries, minutes after an additional 10% tariff on Chinese goods imposed by U.S. President Donald Trump came into effect.】

item.title: 沃达丰第三季度在德国的业绩恶化
item.description: 欧洲移动通信集团沃达丰（Vodafone）报告称，其最大市场德国的业绩在第三季度再次出现下滑，在英国、土耳其和非洲市场表现强劲的情况下，德国的业绩却出现了疲软。【原文：European mobile group Vodafone reported another deterioration in Germany, its biggest market, in its third quarter, a weak point amid otherwise stronger trading in Britain, Turkey and Africa.】

item.title: 帝亚吉欧撤销中期销售预测
item.description: 世界顶级烈酒制造商帝亚吉欧周二撤销了中期有机销售增长目标，理由是宏观经济和地缘政治的不确定性影响了公司的复苏步伐。【原文：Diageo , the world's top spirits maker, withdrew its medium-term organic sales growth target on Tuesday, citing macroeconomic and geopolitical uncertainty hurting the pace of its recovery.】

item.title: 诺基亚与 AT&T 就语音和自动化签署多年扩展协议
item.description: 美国电信运营商AT&T和芬兰网络设备制造商诺基亚周二表示，双方已签署一项多年期扩展协议，以升级AT&T在美国的语音传输和5G网络自动化。【原文：U.S. telecoms operator AT&T and Finnish network equipment maker Nokia have signed a multi-year expansion agreement to upgrade AT&T's voice carriage and 5G network automation in the U.S., the Finnish company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 松下电池部门第三季度营业利润同比增长 39
item.description: 日本松下控股公司（Panasonic Holdings）周四表示，由于美国工厂的盈利能力提高以及储能系统的销售强劲，为特斯拉供应电池的能源部门第三季度营业利润同比增长了 39%。【原文：Japan's Panasonic Holdings said on Thursday the third-quarter operating profit of its energy unit, which supplies batteries to Tesla , rose 39% from a year earlier on improved profitability at its U.S. plant and stronger sales of energy storage systems.】

item.title: 达索系统与大众汽车签署战略合作协议
item.description: 法国软件集团达索系统（Dassault Systemes）周二宣布与大众汽车（Volkswagen）建立长期合作伙伴关系，以加速这家德国汽车制造商向软件定义汽车的转型。【原文：French software group Dassault Systemes on Tuesday announced a long-term partnership with Volkswagen to accelerate the German carmaker's transition towards software defined vehicles.】

item.title: 任天堂将 Switch 全年销量预期下调至 1100 万台
item.description: 日本任天堂周二将老旧的 Switch 游戏机的全年销量预期下调了 12%，降至 1100 万台，以迎接今年推出的后继设备。【原文：Japan's Nintendo cut its full-year sales forecast on Tuesday for the aging Switch console by 12% to 11 million units ahead of the launch of a successor device this year.】

item.title: 阳狮集团预测 2025 年增速放缓，但仍有信心实现超额收益
item.description: 全球市值最大的广告集团阳狮集团周二宣布，预计 2025 年的有机增长率为 4% 至 5%，与 2024 年超出预期的强劲表现相比略有放缓。【原文：Publicis , the world's largest advertising group by market capitalization, announced on Tuesday it expects organic growth of 4% to 5% in 2025, a slight slowdown compared to the robust performance in 2024 that exceeded expectations, propelled by its data-driven targeted marketing.】

item.title: Amundi 因推出规避风险的产品，第四季度资金流入与预期持平
item.description: 欧洲最大的基金管理公司 Amundi 周二公布，由于今年最后三个月对风险规避型产品的需求依然强劲，该公司的季度资金流入量与上一季度持平。【原文：Amundi , Europe's biggest fund manager, posted in-line quarterly inflows on Tuesday, as demand for risk-averse products remained strong over the last three months of the year.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行第四季度业绩超预期，但下调未来一年利润目标
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas）报告称，由于其投资银行家的交易活动激增，该银行第四季度的净收入出现了超出预期的大幅增长，但该银行下调了 2025 年的关键利润目标，并表示将进一步削减成本。【原文：France's BNP Paribas reported a forecast-beating jump in net income in the fourth quarter as its investment bankers rode a surge in trading activity, but the lender lowered a key profit target for 2025 and said it would cut costs further.】

item.title: 聚焦：投资者寻求诺和诺德新一代肥胖症药物 CagriSema 的答案
item.description: 诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk）正承受着来自投资者的压力，要求获得更多有关其下一代肥胖症候选药物 CagriSema 的信息，因为试验结果不明确，导致其股价在 12 月份遭受重创。【原文：Novo Nordisk is under pressure from investors for more information about its next-generation obesity drug candidate CagriSema amid a lack of clarity over trial results that hammered its shares in December.】

item.title: 软件公司达索系统发布 2025 年展望
item.description: 法国软件公司达索系统（Dassault Systemes）周二以其竞争定位为由，预测 2025 年的总收入将增长 6% 至 8%，高于去年 5% 的增幅。【原文：French software company Dassault Systemes on Tuesday forecast total revenue growth of between 6% and 8% for 2025, above the 5% rise seen last year, citing their competitive positioning.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：花旗坚持混合办公，顺应重返办公室的趋势
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周二报道，花旗集团首席执行官简-弗雷泽（Jane Fraser）已通知高层管理人员，该行将继续允许大多数员工每周至少远程工作两天。【原文：Citigroup CEO Jane Fraser has informed top executives that the bank will continue to allow most employees to work remotely at least two days a week, Financial Times reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国反垄断监管机构对谷歌展开调查
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对中国商品征收 10% 额外关税生效几分钟后，中国反垄断监管机构周二表示，已对 Alphabet 旗下谷歌公司展开调查。【原文：China's anti-monopoly regulator said on Tuesday it had launched an investigation into Alphabet's Google, minutes after an additional 10% tariff on Chinese goods imposed by U.S. President Donald Trump came into effect.】

item.title: 瑞银集团季度利润超预期，30 亿美元回购计划公布
item.description: 瑞士最大的银行瑞银集团周二公布，2024 年第四季度净收入为 7.7 亿美元，超出预期。【原文：UBS Group , Switzerland's largest bank, on Tuesday posted net income of $770 million for the fourth quarter of 2024, trouncing forecasts.】

item.title: 中国将 PVH 公司和 Illumina 公司列入不可靠实体名单
item.description: 中国商务部周二表示，已将 PVH 公司和 Illumina 公司列入不可靠实体名单，因为这两家公司采取了所谓的 "针对中国企业的歧视性措施"，"损害 "了中国企业的合法权益。【原文：China's Commerce Ministry said on Tuesday that it had put PVH Corp and Illumina on its unreliable entity list after the two companies took what it called "discriminatory measures against Chinese enterprises" and "damaged" legitimate rights and interests of Chinese companies.】

item.title: VIEW 美国征税生效，中国宣布针锋相对的关税措施
item.description: 中国周二对美国进口商品加征关税，作为对美国对中国商品征收新关税的迅速回应，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）试图惩罚中国没有阻止非法毒品流动之际，世界前两大经济体之间的贸易战再次爆发。【原文：China on Tuesday slapped tariffs on U.S. imports in a rapid response to new U.S. duties on Chinese goods, renewing a trade war between the world's top two economies as President Donald Trump sought to punish China for not halting the flow of illicit drugs.】

item.title: DeepSeek 崩溃后，欧洲人工智能大牛寄希望于 "杰文斯悖论
item.description: 尽管中国出现了廉价的人工智能模型 DeepSeek，但欧洲的人工智能大牛们正在用一个有 160 年历史的经济理论来解释为什么该行业的股票热潮可能还会持续下去。【原文：Artificial intelligence bulls in Europe are dusting off a 160-year-old economic theory to explain why the boom in the sector's stocks may have further to run, despite the emergence of China's cheap AI model DeepSeek.】

item.title: 欧洲 中国开始征收关税，但一切都可以商量
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 中国财政部宣布加征关税反击特朗普贸易举措
item.description: 中国财政部周二宣布对一系列美国产品征收一揽子关税，作为对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布于格林尼治标准时间5:01开始对中国进口产品征收10%关税的直接回应。【原文：China's finance ministry on Tuesday announced a package of tariffs on a range of U.S. products in an immediate response to a 10% tariff on Chinese imports announced by U.S. President Donald Trump that went into effect at 0501 GMT.】

item.title: 美国对中国进口商品征收的关税在特朗普对加拿大和墨西哥缓刑后生效
item.description: 美国对中国进口商品征收 10%的关税开始生效，世界前两大经济体之间可能再次爆发贸易战，因为唐纳德-特朗普总统惩罚中国没有阻止非法毒品的流通。【原文：U.S. tariffs of 10% on Chinese imports came into effect, risking a renewed trade war between the world's top two economies as President Donald Trump punishes China for not halting the flow of illicit drugs.】

item.title: 据《日经新闻》报道，KKR 将提高对富士软的收购价格，高于贝恩的出价
item.description: 据《日经商业日报》周二报道，美国私募股权基金 KKR 将把富士软股票的要约收购价从每股 9,451 日元提高到 9,850 日元，高于贝恩资本竞争对手的要约收购价 9,600 日元。【原文：U.S. private equity fund KKR will raise its tender offer price for Fuji Soft shares to 9,850 yen per share from 9,451 yen, above Bain Capital's rival offer of 9,600 yen, the Nikkei business daily reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: OpenAI 与 Kakao 将为韩国联合开发人工智能产品
item.description: ChatGPT 的创建者 OpenAI 和韩国主要聊天应用运营商 Kakao 周二表示，他们计划建立战略合作伙伴关系，为韩国市场开发人工智能产品。【原文：ChatGPT creator OpenAI and South Korea's dominant chat app operator Kakao said on Tuesday they plan to form a strategic partnership in which they will develop AI products for the Korean market.】

item.title: 州立农场寻求提高加州的费率以抵消野火赔款
item.description: 加利福尼亚州最大的私营保险公司州立农业保险公司周一敦促该州保险监管机构批准紧急提高费率，以帮助抵消该公司在上个月洛杉矶发生毁灭性野火后的巨额赔付。【原文：California's largest private insurer, State Farm, on Monday urged the state's insurance regulator to approve an emergency hike in rates to help offset the hefty payouts the company is making after devastating wildfires in Los Angeles last month.】

item.title: 特朗普称对 TikTok 有 "极大兴趣
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周一表示，人们对 TikTok 很感兴趣，因为他的政府正试图促成这一流行应用程序的出售。【原文：U.S President Donald Trump on Monday said there is a lot of interest in TikTok, as his administration seeks to broker a sale of the popular app.】

item.title: 加元、墨西哥比索因关税缓和大幅反弹后持稳
item.description: 加元、墨西哥比索和欧元兑美元汇率周二持稳，周一，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普暂停对加拿大和墨西哥征收关税一个月后，加元、墨西哥比索和欧元兑美元汇率从多年低点大幅反弹。【原文：The Canadian dollar, Mexican peso and euro were steady against the U.S. dollar on Tuesday following a wild ride on Monday when they rebounded sharply from multi-year lows after U.S. President Donald Trump suspended tariffs on Canada and Mexico by a month.】

item.title: 美国称新关税下来自中国的包裹将面临正式入关
item.description: 根据美国海关和边境保护局周一在网上发布的通知，根据计划于周二实施的新关税，来自中国的邮件包裹必须经过正式的海关入境手续。【原文：Mailed packages from China must undergo formal customs entry under new tariffs scheduled to be implemented on Tuesday, according to a notice from the U.S. Customs and Border Protection posted online on Monday.】

item.title: 销售增长放缓，丰田利润可能连续第二年下滑
item.description: 日本丰田汽车公司（Toyota Motor）周三公布第三季度财报时，预计利润将连续第二个季度下降，因为在混合动力汽车的强劲推动下，销售增长有所放缓。【原文：Japan's Toyota Motor is expected to post its second consecutive quarterly profit drop when it reports third-quarter earnings on Wednesday, as sales growth cools after a strong run powered by hybrid vehicles.】

item.title: 根据欧盟规定，苹果公司对 iPhone 上的首个色情应用程序表示担忧
item.description: 苹果公司周一批评了新近在欧盟iPhone手机上推出的一款色情应用，称欧盟的数字政策损害了消费者对苹果公司的信心。【原文：Apple on Monday criticized a pornography app newly available on iPhones in the European Union, saying the bloc's digital policy was undermining consumer confidence in Apple.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Salesforce 将裁员 1,000 人
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一报道，Salesforce 正在裁员 1000 多人，同时招聘员工销售新的人工智能产品。【原文：Salesforce is cutting more than 1,000 jobs as it simultaneously hires workers to sell new artificial intelligence products, Bloomberg News reported on Monday.】
